titleInfo.title: Bespr.: (1) Giuseppe Tucci (coll. and tr.), Tibetan Folk Songs from Gyantse and Western Tibet. With two Appendices by Namkhai Norbu. Artibus Asiae, New York Univ., Suppl. XXII. Ascona, Switzerland, 1966; (2) Namkhai Norbu Dewang, Musical Tradition of the Tibetan People: Songs in Dance Measure. In: Orientalia Romana, Essays and lect. 2. Serie Orientale Roma XXXVI, 1967
